classification_life.name: Life
classification_life.description: Life classification. Indicates to which extent life is possible, but does not indicate whether it exists.

levels.name: None
levels.description: There is no life whatsoever here.

levels.name: Bacterial
levels.description: Microscopic cellular organisms are capable to form.

levels.name: Floral
levels.description: Established Plant-life that formed of a thin layer of soil over the eons.

levels.name: Animal
levels.description: A well-developed fauna is present. Thick layers of soil and organic matter cover the planet.

levels.name: Sentient
levels.description: A planet capable to support intelligent life. You may find primitive cultures here.

levels.name: Space-faring
levels.description: A planet with ideal conditions to develop sentient life capable of intergalactic travel. You may find technologically advanced cultures here.

levels.name: No Atmosphere
levels.description: No gaseous matter present. Nothing to see here.

levels.name: Thin Atmosphere
levels.description: Thin Atmosphere. Mostly dust storms, limited rainfall.

levels.name: Normal Storms
levels.description: Normal rainfall and severity of thunderstorms. Occasional hurricanes, tornadoes, monsoon.

levels.name: Raging Storms
levels.description: Severe rain, thunderstorms and erosion. Frequent hurricanes, tornados, monsoon.

levels.name: Extreme Storms
levels.description: High speed storms. Neither natural nor human structures can withstand them.

levels.name: Solar Winds
levels.description: Searing hot, intense particle storms.

levels.name: Extreme Cold
levels.description: Temperature too low to form life other than rudimentary, microbial life.

levels.name: Cold
levels.description: Life is possible at low temperatures, but lifeforms require specific adaptions to survive.

levels.name: Normal
levels.description: This Base Level defines the temperature at which Life thrives.

levels.name: Hot
levels.description: Life is possible at hot temperatures, but lifeforms require specific adaptions to survive.

levels.name: Extremely Hot
levels.description: Temperature too high to form life other than rudimentary, microbial life.

levels.name: Very Low
levels.description: Radiation levels are almost zero.

levels.name: Low
levels.description: Radiation level is low enough to sustain life without affecting it.

levels.name: Medium
levels.description: Radiation levels are low enough to sustain life, but it causes frequent mutations.

levels.name: High
levels.description: Life is impossible at these radiation levels.
